cards.name: Skirmish
cards.ability: After combat: If you won the combat, choose one of the fighters in the combat and move them up to 2 spaces.

cards.name: Crash through the trees
cards.ability: Move Bigfoot up to 5 spaces. You may move Bigfoot through spaces containing opposing fighters.

cards.name: It's just your imagination
cards.ability: Immediately: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.

cards.name: Savagery
cards.ability: If you won the combat, deal 1 damage to each fighter adjacent to Bigfoot.

cards.name: Hoax
cards.ability: After combat: Move your fighter up to 5 spaces. You may move that fighter through spaces containing opposing fighters.

cards.name: Jackalope horns
cards.ability: Move the Jackalope up to 5 spaces. You may move the Jackalope through spaces containing opposing fighters. Then deal 2 damage to any one fighter adjacent to the Jackalope.

cards.name: Disengage
cards.ability: After combat: Choose an empty space in this fighter's zone. Place this fighter in that space.

cards.name: Momentous shift
cards.ability: During combat: If your fighter started this turn in a different space, this card's value is 5 instead.

cards.name: Feint
cards.ability: Immediately: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.

cards.name: Regroup
cards.ability: After combat: Draw 1 card. If you won the combat, draw 2 cards instead.
